Talk_14:
<snd:Determination_00>I will be in overall command here. Mark
targets with your arrows and I will unleash
my lightning on them!
What's more, my control over my lightning
continues to improve—with time to charge
up, I can hit distant targets!
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry>What are you thinking dressing that way
at a time like this?!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:WeaponSwingS_01>Link! When the hives open up to release
more Gibdos, fire arrows at them. I'll
strike with my lightning when you do!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Work>I will keep Lady Riju safe! You deal with
the Gibdo hives!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>The writing on it says...


"Standing back-to-back with the throne,
witness red pillars across a vast sea.

"Unite the pillars in light to reveal the
lightning stone and open the way.

"You who can hear my voice, come to me.
I await you."
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>Sarqso for your help against the Gibdos.
There are spoils from the battle in the
courtyard—use them as you wish.
If you are looking for Lady Riju, she said
something about the mural in the shelter
and set off in that direction.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Help yourself to the spoils from the battle.


If you are looking for Lady Riju, I believe
she is at the mural in the shelter.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad_01>The sand shroud makes it impossible to
explore the Gerudo Desert, except maybe
if you could soar in the sky like a Rito...
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Hmm. You appear to lack a bow of
any kind...
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Speak with that soldier over there. <sp:5:0:0>She is
responsible for managing the weapons.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Lady Riju should be at the mural in the
shelter. Last I saw her, she seemed a
bit preoccupied.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Trouble_00>Lady Riju said that she spotted a light out
in the sand shroud and quickly departed.
She didn't take anyone with her...
I'm glad the chief does not possess an
overly cautious nature, but at times
she can be a bit reckless.
Could you find her? I would feel better
knowing you were there if she needed
any help.
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Hmm. You don't have a bow, and even if
you did, you don't have any arrows to
shoot from it...
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0d00><snd:Determination_00>OK, Link! We need to get to the very top!


To start, we should do what that
mysterious voice suggested and try
to find those four battery devices...
Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>What are you...<sp:5:1:0> You should be wearing
something during battle!
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseM_01>I wouldn't recommend dressing as an
enemy of the Gerudo. Don't be surprised
if someone comes after you!
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Understand>Link, I'd like your help with this.


Fire an arrow toward that <clr:0000>dummy<clr:ffff>. If I aim
for the arrow with my lightning...
Talk_29:
<snd:Angry>That hive... It opens up whenever more
enemies emerge. I bet I can destroy it
with my lightning strikes!
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice_01>Is that really how you're going into battle?


You might consider wearing armor of
some kind, but it is your decision...
Talk_01: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Understand>Link... Everyone... I believe in all of you!
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>The Gibdos just keep coming. If we can't
destroy that hive, we'll be overrun!
Talk_02:
<snd:Determination_00>OK, here we go! <clr:0000>When I've charged up
enough power<clr:ffff>, you can show me where
to strike by firing an arrow!
Talk_31:
<snd:Determination_00>Yes! We've destroyed the hive! All that's
left is to clean up the remaining monsters!
Talk_03: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Work>If Lady Riju falls, it's all over.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Work>The flood of monsters has been stopped!
Let's wipe out the stragglers!
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:WeaponSwingS_01>That's all the hives! Excellent! Now take
out any remaining monsters!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>The sand shroud, the sudden appearance
of the Gibdos and their hives... Strange
events keep happening, one after another.
And we saw Zelda near Kara Kara Bazaar,
but she hasn't been seen anywhere
around Gerudo Town.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry_00>There's something bigger going on, but
for now, we need to focus on the problem
at hand and <clr:0000>prepare to fight<clr:ffff>.
Link, I need your help again.


Speak with Buliara and the soldiers,
and help us organize our defenses.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Angry_00>The monster fled up to the top
of the temple.

So how do we get up there?
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you have questions about preparing
for the battle?
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Understand>Aha! We've charged all of the batteries!


Come on, Link. Let's check out
the device!
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Angry_00>I see. <sp:5:0:0>Let me know when they are
ready, then.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The Gibdos we've encountered in the
desert do not fall easily when struck.
Attacks only seem to dull a blade...
But <clr:0000>fire <clr:ffff>attacks, as well as Lady Riju's
<clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff>, appear to be very effective
against them.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rather than relying on the brute force of
swords and spears, we should try to
explore other ways to damage them.
In any case, we learned in the last fight
that they are not unbeatable. That is
enough to give us hope.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_00>Very well.<sp:5:0:0> In that case, please report to
Lady Riju.

When the battle begins, I will be focused
on protecting her. For the <clr:0000>sake<clr:ffff> of the
Gerudo, nothing can happen to <clr:0000>her<clr:ffff>.
